body.name: Apple iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro Silicone Case with MagSafe - Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 7 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 7 mins
features: Display size: 6.1 inches.The silky, soft-touch finish of the silicone exterior feels great in your hand. And on the inside, there’s a soft microfiber lining for even more protection.
With built-in magnets that align perfectly with iPhone 12 | 12 Pro, the case offers a magical attach and detach experience, every time.

The perfectly aligned magnets make wireless charging faster and easier than ever before. And when it’s time to charge, just leave the case on your iPhone and snap on your MagSafe charger, or set it on your Qi-certified charger.

Like every Apple-designed case, it undergoes thousands of hours of testing throughout the design and manufacturing process. So not only does it look great, it’s built to protect your iPhone from scratches and drops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This case is not worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: I usually have an iphone case for the life of the iPhone. I purchased this silicone case and it started to deteriorate quickly. First the corners start cracking and crumbling. Then other places around the edge start doing the same. I would take a picture, but I’m afraid if I took it off my phone it would totally disintegrate. Plus the charging magnet is temperamental. I would recommend staying away from this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had dozens of cases throughout the years but this one is probably my favorite. Thin, sleek, comfortable and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Phone Case
reviews.reviewText: Great Phone case! Looks great, feels great, and I got it at a great price. Highly recommend getting a name brand or quality phone case. It makes all the difference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love this case, it's protected my phone but ...
reviews.reviewText: This is my second case. I love this case, it's protected my phone, but ... each time the phone is dropped another chunk of silicone breaks or peels off the case. The color is great, the feel is great, not too sticky or slippery, nice feel in my hand, slim. I understand silicone and there is a fine balance between how hard to make it vs look and feel. For me the look and feel of the product when I am carrying it was more important so I bought another one and know it will only last me a year or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value For This iPhone Case!
reviews.reviewText: I was a little hesitant about buying this case considering the price-point, but I figured I’d give it a try after it went on sale. I am so glad that I did! The fit is absolutely perfect, the texture is perfect for griping but not being too sticky, and it cleans very easily. I got white concrete dust all over my hands, and I had to use my phone, so I got that dust all over the case while I was holding it. It wiped right off with a cloth, none of it stuck to the case, which I thought was very impressive with how sticky that dust can be. I’ve gotten it on tool handles, and other things where it actually stuck to it. So definitely good on the ease of cleaning. Also, if anyone is curious, this case’s silicone material matches the feel of the silicone on the iPad Magic Keyboard Case, and it also perfectly color matches with the black one. And the magsafe capabilities are awesome! I would highly recommend this case. 👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wasn’t sure about the color but it is a beautiful color
reviews.reviewText: Love that fact that it is easy to find when you forget where you left it just the right color nor to red

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A real heart breaker
reviews.reviewText: I bought this case in January. Let me tell you that I didn't just want to love this case -- I actually loved it. I loved the hand-feel, I loved the mag-safe, I loved the bright color. I convinced my husband and several friends to buy the same silicone case.Fast forward 9 months and this case is garbage.First, I dropped my phone once in July. My entire back glass is shattered. Fast forward a few weeks and I started to notice cracking around the edges of the phone. 3 out of 4 corners now have cracked and ripped pieces.I haven't been especially hard on this phone or case. And I've never had a case respond so poorly to regular use, or need to be replaced in nine months.
Protects phone and can still wirelessly charge.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good case and design works as well as one from Appel and much cheaper
reviews.reviewText: This silicon case has great protection, I’ve had it for a while and dropped my phone many times and nothings broke. It’s much cheaper than buying from Apple and is the exact same

reviews.reviewTitle: You call this “Apple” quality?! STEER CLEAR! OVERPRICED!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for $69+ because it was an official Apple case that had MagSafe, the quality is anything but official.Goods:The case is soft to hold, the colour is nice, and it does offer decent protection. MagSafe is currently a useless feature.Cons:Less than a year of ownership, the case’s corners, have started to peel off. Mind you, I accidentally dropped my phone 3 separate times, onto a hardwood floor, from a short height. So in a way, the case did it’s job but still, you expect more from an Apple product.Despite the case still being under warranty, Apple refuses to offer a refund or a FREE replacement (offered a paid replacement of $69+ LOL). Called them twice, and both times they said my case damage doesn’t fall/look like the “pictures” of what falls under their “warranty” policy. In other words “it’s not a manufacturer defect, so we can’t do anything.”Reading the other reviews on here, it seems corner peeling is a common occurrence with these cases. If that’s not considered a manufacturer defect, then I don’t know what is.
